elements.name: comment
elements.Natalia_comment: ******NOTE: This is RED's current version - Oct 27, through AYW 3 ******

elements.name: module_2_panel
elements.baker_comment: BAKER NOTE: module_2_panel and ayw1-inperson panel are the same for SY21-22.  We chose to use module_2_panel arbitrarily, and we changed the name and heading on this page.

elements.name: module_4_panel
elements.baker_comment: BAKER NOTE: module_4_panel and ayw2-inperson panel are the same for SY21-22.  We chose to use module_4_panel arbitrarily, and we changed the name and heading on this page. ALSO AYW 1+2 is problematic. People will get duplicate questions.  Should we turn on just the AYW2 survey for 1+2 folks?

elements.name: ayw_workshop_1_2_panel
elements.baker_comment: BAKER NOTE: ayw_workshop_1_2_panel contains unduplicated quetsions for learning objectives from module_4_panel and ayw2-inperson

elements.name: module_5_panel
elements.natalia_comment: NATALIA NOTE: AYW3 includes modules 5 and 6, question sets are different for each module, so there are three combinations: ayw_module_5 is for mod 5 on its own, ayw_module_6 is for Mod 6 on its own, ayw3_panel is for sessions where both modules are covered.

elements.name: module_6_panel
elements.natalia_comment: NATALIA NOTE: AYW3 includes modules 5 and 6, question sets are different for each module, so there are three combinations: ayw_module_5 is for mod 5 on its own, ayw_module_6 is for Mod 6 on its own, ayw3_panel is for sessions where both modules are covered.

elements.name: ayw3_panel
elements.natalia_comment: NATALIA NOTE: AYW3 includes modules 5 and 6, question sets are different for each module, so there are three combinations: ayw_module_5 is for mod 5 on its own, ayw_module_6 is for Mod 6 on its own, ayw3_panel is for sessions where both modules are covered.
